Text.Text: Greetings... I'm Venla, the village's heal - you!  You're the ones the children say saved them from Limha!  Oh, thank you!
Greetings... I'm Venla, the village's healer.  Oh!  You're wounded!
Greetings... I'm Venla, the village's healer.  I've many things to tend to, traveler, so please be quick...
Suoma will be pleased to hear you've helped me... helped all of us!
Suoma will be pleased to hear you've helped me... helped all of -  oh!  You're wounded!
I... that's... that's not in my power to do.  You'd have to speak with Suoma the Elder.  Maybe she can help you.
I can offer my skills as a healer, and a variety of medicines and poultices, too.  Oh... and you can rest here, if you'd like.

Oh!  You must be the ones she spoke of, then... the strangers in her dream.  It's horrible... many children have vanished recently.  Suoma hopes you can find them, or at least what they've fallen victim to...
Hmm?

Only that our best hunters have searched everywhere and found no trace of them.  Some feel that they were lost in the Fell Wood to the east... that some fey creature like a dryad or nymph stole them away.
Well, I'm in charge of gathering herbs and medicinal plants as well as tended to the sick and hurt.  It's been difficult lately, since the Cold Marshes have become so dangerous.

Oh!  If you're going to the Cold Marshes, yes... if you see any of the herb "frostrose" there, bring it back.  I'll make medicine with it that eliminates poison and disease from the body, and will gladly give you some!
Oh, good!  Here, take this medicine... and if you need more of it later, I'll be selling whatever the village won't need.  Thank you, traveler!
Oh, you've returned!  The children said that you destroyed Limha and saved them - thank you, thank you!
Welcome back, trav- Oh!  You're wounded!
Welcome back, traveler.  Have you had any luck discovering what's happened to the children, yet?
Welcome back, traveler.

No... but... many years ago I encountered a strange elderly woman in the Cold Marshes.  I never saw her again, but she seemed even older than I am now... she's likely long dead.  Why?  Did this woman you met know of the children?
Oh?  You should return to this woman and speak to her of it, then!
I see...

Again you have my thanks, traveler!  When you felled the awful poppets those demon-kin made, you freed our hunters' mortal shells - I was able to use my magic to return them to life.  Oh, I could never thank you *enough!*
I see...
You've led monsters to the village - please, kill them before they hurt someone!
I'm sorry... I don't.
Oh, I... I see.  Here you are; these potions should help.
I'm sorry... I don't.

But... I... you see, I haven't been there in some time.  I do remember one hidden trail, though - in a large clearing split by a switch-back and three twisted, limbless trees.  Go northeast, southeast, northwest, and southeast again.  It leads to some old standing stones.
Of course... no thanks necessary.
Of course... no thanks necessary.
Your kind words will buy me nothing.  What about a reward?
Of course.  Farewell.
Yes... can you help?
It's nothing.  Suoma sent me to speak with you.
Don't worry.  I had some questions.
Never mind it.  Farewell.
Suoma sent me to speak with you.  I'm supposed to help you.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Never mind.  Farewell.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Farewell, Venla.
Yes... can you help?
Don't concern yourself.  I had some questions.
Never mind it.  Farewell.
Very well.  I had some questions.
Then could I get healing, at least?
I'll do that.  Farewell.
What sort of healing can you provide?
Let's see your medicines and poultices.
What sort of healing can you provide?
Let's see your medicines and poultices.
I'd like to rest.
Forget that for now - Suoma sent me to speak with you.
Actually, I had some questions.
Never mind, Venla.  Farewell.
Are there any clues as to what happened?
Let me ask about something else.
I'll return if I find something out.  Farewell.
Are there any clues about the missing children?
Is this the frostrose you needed?
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Do you know anything of the ghost haunting the western hunting grounds?
A drinking horn was stolen from the nearby barrow.  Do you know anything about that?
Do you know the way through the eastern woods?
Suoma said that the villagers should help me however they can.  Is there any equipment you could spare?
I thought that, since I'm helping the village, it's in the village's interest to help me.  Is there any equipment you could spare?
I'm not pleased about helping this village for nothing when I could just as easily put it to the torch.  Let's say you make it worth my while?
Would you tell me about yourself?
Could I get healing here?
Never mind, Venla.  Farewell.
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
All right.  I had some questions.
I see.  I need healing.
I'll return if I find something out.  Farewell, Venla.
Could I help at all?
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Suoma sent me to speak with you.  I'm supposed to help you.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
I see.  Farewell, Venla.
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Actually, I have some right here...
Suoma sent me to speak with you.  I'm supposed to help you.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
I'll bring some back if I find any, Venla.  Farewell.
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Are there any clues about the missing children?
I had some questions.
Could I get healing here?
Of course, Venla.  Farewell.
Of course... no thanks necessary.
Of course... no thanks necessary.
Your kind words will buy me nothing.  What about a reward?
I had some questions.
Of course.  Farewell.
Yes... can you help?
Do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
Are there any clues about the missing children?
It's nothing.  Suoma sent me to speak with you.
It doesn't matter.  I found some frostrose.
Don't worry, Venla.  I had some questions.
Never mind it.  Farewell.
No, but do you know anything of the woman who lives in the eastern wilderness?
No, but are there any clues about the missing children?
No, but I found some frostrose.
No, but I had some questions.
Not yet, but I need healing.
No, I haven't.  Farewell, Venla.
Suoma sent me to speak with you.  I'm supposed to help you.
I found some frostrose.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
I was just passing by, Venla.  Farewell.
I don't know, but a dryad told me a mysterious woman had taken the children.
She claimed not to, but a dryad told me a mysterious woman had taken the children.
I don't know.
No, she didn't.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
I'll return if I find something out.  Farewell.
Are there any clues about the missing children?
I had some questions.
I need healing.
I'll return if I find something out.  Farewell.
Save your praise for someone that might find worth in it; we merely slew some monsters that attacked us.  Farewell.
Of course.  Farewell.
We'll rest for eight hours.
We'll rest until we're fully healed.
Never mind, Venla.  Farewell.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Farewell, Venla.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Farewell, Venla.
I think you do, but you think I'll leave without helping the village if you tell me.  So, then... what say you tell me, and I agree not to put this whole place to the torch?
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Farewell, Venla.
I had some questions.
I need healing.
Farewell, Venla.
